subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: As roars shook the arena, the Rangers earned an intense 2-1 victory on Wednesday and a trip to Pittsburgh to play the Penguins on Friday in Game 1 of the second round.
snippet: As roars shook the arena, the Rangers earned an intense 2-1 victory on Wednesday and a trip to Pittsburgh to play the Penguins on Friday in Game 1 of the second round.
